name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Omaru Poruka Birthday Concert2024!! POL ROCK FES!!!!! [W25VvoWh5zY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka and Hakos Baelz continue their performance of the song 'Hibana'.
Instrumental transition between songs with stage effects.
Omaru Polka and Hakos Baelz perform the song 'Roki'.

subtitles.original: ...そうで　チュウ　待って
